step.name: README
step.action: tsenv.exe "README=This task sequence demonstrates using WMI queries to evaluate the chassis type for the device by querying Win32_ComputerSystem. If the condition is met then any steps in the group are run, if not then the entire gruop is skipped. See https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/mem/configmgr/osd/understand/using-task-sequence-variables & https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/windows/win32/cimwin32prov/win32-computersystem for more information." /hiddenflag:False

defaultVarList.variable: This task sequence demonstrates using WMI queries to evaluate the chassis type for the device by querying Win32_ComputerSystem. If the condition is met then any steps in the group are run, if not then the entire gruop is skipped. See https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/mem/configmgr/osd/understand/using-task-sequence-variables & https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/windows/win32/cimwin32prov/win32-computersystem for more information.

group.name: Is Laptop
group.description: Step in this group will only run if the client is a Desktop

group.name: Is Desktop
group.description: Step in this group will only run if the client is a Desktop

expression.variable: Select * from Win32_ComputerSystem where PCSystemType= "3" or PCSystemType= "1" or PCSystemType= "6"

group.name: Is Server
group.description: Step in this group will only run if the client is a Server

expression.variable: Select * from Win32_ComputerSystem where PCSystemType = "4" or PCSystemType = "7" or PCSystemType = "5"
